navigation.timeTravelTooltip: This shows a selection of my technical skills from the beginning of my career as a developer in IT or on the internet.

game.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all progress? This action cannot be undone.

language.restartWarning: The game will restart with the new language

welcome.title: Hello. I am Mr. X.
welcome.subtitle: Creator of this resume game.
welcome.intro: You are inside an interactive developer profile: frontend specialist, a bit of a fullstacker, product architect and IT handyman.
welcome.twist: But everything is arranged differently here.
welcome.quest: To find out who is behind this project, what they can do, how they think and how to contact ‚Äî you need to complete the game.
welcome.finale: In the finale, skills, projects, code and contacts will open ‚Äî and it will become clear whether our goals match.

contact.title: Contact
contact.messagePlaceholder: Share your thoughts about the project...
contact.nameLabel: Your name or how to address you
contact.contactPlaceholder: Email, Telegram, phone or other contact method
contact.successText: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you soon.

philosophy.title: Philosophy question
philosophy.subtitle: Your view on development matters for compatibility
philosophy.warningText: Wrong answers affect compatibility. If you lose all lives, the game will end.
philosophy.placeholder: Share your opinion on this issue...

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.placeholder: No achievements yet. Explore bubbles to unlock them!

gameOver.title: Game Over
gameOver.message: You lost all lives. Try again!

philosophy.title: Our goals and values don't match.
philosophy.subtext: Apparently, we have different views on development and teamwork. Effective collaboration under such conditions will be difficult.
philosophy.suggestion: Try playing the game again, perhaps you should be more loyal to the team's philosophy...

projectTransition.congratulations: Congratulations! You reached the level where the study of project technologies begins.

changes.skills: Now only skills and technologies that are necessary for creating a similar project will be shown.
changes.checkLevel: Check if you match this level of development!

bubble.hiddenDescription: This bubble is almost invisible. Find it!

project.title: Project technologies
project.description: Skills and technologies required to build a similar project

retro.title: Retro
retro.description: Personal retrospective: childhood, first steps and early events

clicker.rulesDescription: Pop as many bubbles as you can in 60 seconds. Labels are hidden, starfield is off, physics is faster.
clicker.ruleAbort: Click the widget again to abort

final.title: Game completed!
final.subtitle: Thank you for the retro journey

chat.title: Chat Bot
chat.widgetTooltip: Ask questions about resume, experience or projects
chat.emptyState: Ask a question and I'll help you learn more about the author and his projects
